headline: Longtime Jefferson County Sheriff Passes Away
author: Jim Michaels
sentences: Jefferson County Sheriff Fred Abdalla died early Tuesday, having served the county in that position for 37 years.
Governor Mike DeWine knew Sheriff Abdalla welll; he called him a dedicated, no-nonsense lawman.
STEUBENVILLE, Ohio (News Talk 1480 WHBC) â€“ He obviously had the job for life.
His health had been declining in recent months.
